Package com.github.rmielnik.list

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RecyclerItem
    Represents an object that will be displayed in RecyclerView.
    UpdatableItem
    Represents an object that can generate update payload by comparing itself with an object in up-to-date state.
    ViewHolderFactory<T extends RecyclerItem>
    Represents object that is able to create class AbstractViewHolder or class AbstractUpdatableViewHolder for given RecyclerItem.viewHolderType.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractUpdatableViewHolder<T extends RecyclerItem>
    An extension of class AbstractViewHolder that is able to handle update payload.
    AbstractViewHolder<T extends RecyclerItem>
    An extension of RecyclerView.ViewHolder that exposes an abstract method for updating data in View.
    SimpleDiffCallback<T extends RecyclerItem>
    Default implementation of androidx.recyclerview.widget.DiffUtil.ItemCallback.
    SimpleListAdapter<T extends RecyclerItem>
    An implementation of androidx.recyclerview.widget.ListAdapter.
    ViewHolderFactoryRegistry
    Util class for creating customizable and easy to use ViewHolderFactory.
    ViewHolderFactoryRegistryKt
